thread.title: Kelly Ripa Clarifies Comments That Mark Consuelos is 'Mean' After Sex: 'I Was Joking!'
thread.title_full: Kelly Ripa Clarifies Comments That Mark Consuelos is 'Mean' After Sex: 'I Was Joking!'

author: Alex Ungerman
title: Kelly Ripa Clarifies Comments That Mark Consuelos is 'Mean' After Sex: 'I Was Joking!'
text: Kelly Ripa Clarifies Comments That Mark Consuelos is 'Mean' After Sex: 'I Was Joking!' by Alex Ungerman 10:18   Playing Kelly Ripa Clarifies Comments That Mark Consuelos is 'Mean' After Sex: 'I Was Joking!' Kelly Ripa would like to clarify something. The Live! With Kelly host had husband of over 20 years, Mark Consuelos, on the program this week, where she walked back some stir-causing comments she made last week that he was sometimes " mean " after sex. "I'm sorry! I was joking," the 46-year-old TV personality shared. "This is a funny, irreverent show. I didn't realize that it would become trending news." WATCH: Kelly Ripa Says Mark Consuelos Is 'Mean' to Her After Sex: 'I Think It's Bizarre' "I didn't refute it because I thought it was the most ridiculous thing I ever heard," said Ripa's husband, 45, revealing that he laughed it off at the time the comment was made. "To set the record straight that no one can be mean after something if they are unconscious," Consuelos added. "I sleep." "That's what I meant," Ripa responded. "Completely disinterested, like, sound asleep." WATCH: Mark Consuelos Gushes Over Wife Kelly Ripa, Shares the Secret to Their 20-Year Marriage "How about satisfied and just happy?" the actor sweetly replied. Before their couples TV appearance, Consuelos shared on Instagram, "As you can tell @kellyripa is super excited I'm cohosting tomorrow AM." A post shared by Mark Consuelos. (@instasuelos) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:56pm PST Well, we're glad to have everything cleared up. Meanwhile, at the end of last year, Ripa shared a photo of the couple's 19-year-old son, Michael, who looks JUST like his dad . Watch the video below to see the uncanny resemblance.
